heading: HB00221
0: AN ACT CREATING THE NATIONAL WATER RESOURCES MANAGEMENT AUTHORITY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00221
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE NATIONAL WATER RESOURCES MANAGEMENT AUTHORITY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLARICA, LINABELLE RUTH R.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Savellano (020 2016-09-07)2. Mariño (063 2017-01-30)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for all bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG meeting, members instructed secretariat to request with the Committee on Rules to jointly refer water bills with the Committees on Public Works and Highways and Government Reorganization (as primary committee)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-07-26
